name: Verify Camera Terminal Activation After Manual Completion
description: Validates that a third terminal (camera) becomes available after completing the Operations Manual.
testObjective: Ensure tutorial progression correctly unlocks camera terminal after manual is read.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has completed reading Operations Manual

steps.action: Close the Operations Manual after reading
steps.expected: Manual closes and returns to ship view

steps.action: Look to the left side of the terminal array
steps.expected: Third terminal (camera) has been added on the left

steps.action: Verify the right terminal (map) is still available

postconditions: Camera terminal is unlocked and accessible
Three terminals are now available (filesystem, camera, map)
